00048 void MemMapFileTest::FilenameTest()
00049 {
00050         MemMapFile mmfile;
00051         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetFilename() == "fred_flintstone");
00053 }

00055 void MemMapFileTest::CreateTest()
00056 {
00057         MemMapFile mmfile;
00058         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00061 }

00063 void MemMapFileTest::OpenTest()
00064 {
00065         MemMapFile mmfile;
00066         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00070 }

00072 void MemMapFileTest::MapDataTest()
00073 {
00074         MemMapFile mmfile;
00075         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00080 }

00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));

00092 void MemMapFileTest::GetDataPtrTest()
00093 {
00094         MemMapFile mmfile;
00095         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00099         char* ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ptr != 0);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00102 }

00104 void MemMapFileTest::GetFirstMappedBytePosTest()
00105 {
00106         MemMapFile mmfile;
00107         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(50, 150));
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetFirstMappedBytePos() == 50);
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00113 }

00115 void MemMapFileTest::GetBytesMappedTest()
00116 {
00117         MemMapFile mmfile;
00118         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(100, 200));
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.GetBytesMapped() == 100);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00124 }
00125 
00126 void MemMapFileTest::GetLastErrorTest()
00127 {
00128         MemMapFile mmfile;
00129         std::wstring errorMsg = mmfile.GetLastError();
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(errorMsg.length() == 0); 
00131         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00132         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE) == false);
00133         errorMsg = mmfile.GetLastError();
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(errorMsg.length() > 0);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00136 }
00137 
00138 void MemMapFileTest::IsViewMappedTest()
00139 {
00140         MemMapFile mmfile;
00141         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped());
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00149 }

00152 {
00153         MemMapFile mmfile;
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200) == false);
00155 }

00157 void MemMapFileTest::OpenNoCreateTest()
00158 {
00159         MemMapFile mmfile;
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE) == false);
00161 }

00163 void MemMapFileTest::WriteValuesTest()
00164 {
00165         MemMapFile mmfile;
00166         mmfile.SetFilename("fred_flintstone");
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.IsViewMapped() == false);
00168         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Create(200));
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE));
00170         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 100));
00171         char* ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00172         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ptr);
00173         *ptr = 'c';
00174         ptr++;
00175         *ptr = 's';
00176         // Re-map data
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(100, 100));
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(mmfile.MapData(0, 200));
00179         // Check the value
00180         ptr = mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*ptr == 'c');
00182         ++ptr;
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(*ptr == 's');
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(mmfile.Close());
00185 }
